name: XLU Basic Blueprint Package
desc: A blueprint package of a common station variation in Lanestate Shipwright. As it enables the heavy industry to produce standard-grade ship hulls and shipboard weapons with very dense armor shaping.

name: XLU Heavy Blueprint Package
desc: An unusual set of blueprints made in Lanestate Shipwrights, enable heavy industries to build larger ship hulls and weapons not normally meant for Domain-standard shipyards.
